sentences.english: This dictionary has been put together by several persons.
sentences.chinese: 這部詞典是由好幾個人合編成的。

sentences.english: He has edited or co-edited eight books on health policy research.
sentences.chinese: 他主編或參與合編了8本關於健康政策研究的書籍。
